function App() { return (

setTitle(e.target.value)} /> setDescription(e.target.value)} /> setImageUrl(e.target.value)} /> setDownloadUrl(e.target.value)} /> setReadUrl(e.target.value)} />

Cards

{cards.length === 0 &&

No cards yet.

} {cards.map((card) => (

{card.title}

))}
); } export default App;
